loc2.name: The Dreamlands
loc2.description: You see the mountains move. Lose 1 Sanity from the terror.

loc1.description: Fear grabs you as the buzzing entities approach. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc1.name: Yuggoth

other.description: A ripple in the air passes over you. Pass a Lore(-1) check or lose 1 Spell of your choice as it is burned from your mind.
